name: Cookie Match: Enhanced Edition
description:
Cookie Match is a game that everyone can enjoy.
To match cookies and cookie cutters or icings, you will face different tricks in each room, that gives you a unique experience and entertainment.
Clear all the stages and reveal cookies' true stories!

How to play


  • Move cookies to place them in the matching cookie cutters or the matching cookie icings.
  • All the cookies move in the same direction as a set.
  • Once a cookie meets the matching cutter or the matching cookie icing, the decoration is completed.

Caution


  • Butter packs are unmovable, like a wall.
  • If a cookie hits the cutlery or a pigeon, then the cookie is fallen apart.

Controls


  • Control the direction with arrow keys or WASD (up / left / down / right) or touch / swipe
  • R for the stage reset
  • F for fullscreen on / off
  • ESC for the previous page
  • Backspace or Delete key for undo
  • M for music on / off

* Background music from Epidemic Sound
